member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getMouseCoord
member.summary: Returns a vector containing integer values of mouse pointer position.
member.returns: Integer mouse pointer position.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getMouseCoordDelta
member.summary: Returns a vector containing integer screen position change of the mouse pointer along the X and Y axes — the difference between the values in the previous and the current frames.
member.returns: Integer mouse pointer position delta.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getMouseDelta
member.summary: Returns a vector containing float screen position change of the mouse pointer along the X and Y axes — the difference between the values in the previous and the current frames. Float values are useful for rotation and other smooth transformations.
member.returns: Float mouse pointer position delta.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getMouseWheel
member.summary: Returns the current mouse scroll value. Negative values correspond to scrolling downwards; positive values correspond to scrolling upwards; the value is zero when the mouse wheel is not scrolled.
member.returns: Mouse scroll value in the [-1;1] range.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getMouseWheelHorizontal
member.summary: Returns the current horizontal mouse scroll value.
member.returns: Horizontal mouse scroll value in the [-1;1] range.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getCountGamePads
member.summary: Returns the number of all game pads.
member.returns: Number of all game pads.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getGamePad(int)
member.summary: Returns a game pad of the given index.
member.returns: InputGamepad object.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getCountActiveGamePads
member.summary: Returns the number of active game pads.
member.returns: Number of active game pads.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getActiveGamePad(int)
member.summary: Returns an active game pad of the given index.
member.returns: InputGamePad object.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.isKeyPressed(Input::KEY)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given key is pressed or not. Check this value to perform continuous actions.
member.param: One of the preset KEY_ codes.
member.returns: 1 if the key is pressed; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.isKeyDown(Input::KEY)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given key was pressed during the current frame or not. Check this value to perform one-time actions on pressing a key.
member.param: One of the preset KEY_ codes.
member.returns: 1 during the first frame when the key was pressed, 0 for the following ones until it is released and pressed again.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.isKeyUp(Input::KEY)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given key was released during the current frame or not. Check this value to perform one-time actions on releasing a key.
member.param: One of the preset KEY_ codes.
member.returns: 1 during the first frame when the key was released; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.isMouseButtonPressed(Input::MOUSE_BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given mouse button is pressed or not. Check this value to perform continuous actions.
member.param: One of the preset MOUSE_BUTTON_ codes.
member.returns: 1 if the mouse button is pressed; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.isMouseButtonDown(Input::MOUSE_BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given mouse button was pressed during the current frame or not. Check this value to perform one-time actions on pressing a mouse button.
member.param: One of the preset MOUSE_BUTTON_ codes.
member.returns: 1 during the first frame when the mouse button was released; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.isMouseButtonUp(Input::MOUSE_BUTTON)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given mouse button was released during the current frame or not. Check this value to perform one-time actions on releasing a mouse button.
member.param: One of the preset MOUSE_BUTTON_ codes.
member.returns: 1 during the first frame when the mouse button was released; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.setMouseHandle(Input::MOUSE_HANDLE)
member.param: Mouse behavior mode, one of the MOUSE_HANDLE_* values.

member.name: M:Unigine.Input.getMouseHandle
member.returns: Mouse behavior mode, one of the MOUSE_HANDLE_* values.

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_0
member.summary: The 0 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_1
member.summary: The 1 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_2
member.summary: The 2 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_3
member.summary: The 3 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_4
member.summary: The 4 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_5
member.summary: The 5 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_6
member.summary: The 6 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_7
member.summary: The 7 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_8
member.summary: The 8 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.KEY_DIGIT_9
member.summary: The 9 key of the alphanumeric keyboard

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.MOUSE_HANDLE_GRAB
member.summary: The mouse is grabbed when clicked (the cursor disappears and camera movement is controlled by the mouse).

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.MOUSE_HANDLE_SOFT
member.summary: The mouse cursor disappears after being idle for a short time period.

member.name: F:Unigine.Input.MOUSE_HANDLE_USER
member.summary: The mouse is not handled by the system (allows input handling by some custom module).

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getNumber
member.summary: Returns the game pad number (up to four game pads are supported).
member.returns: Game pad number.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getName
member.summary: Returns the name of the game pad.
member.returns: One of the following:GamePadWheelArcade StickFlight StickDance PadGuitarDrum KitUnknown

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.setFilter(float)
member.summary: Sets a filter value used to correct the current state of the analog axis relative to the previous one. Axis states are interpolated for thumbsticks and triggers.
member.param: Filter value for interpolation between axis states. The provided value is clamped to a range [0;1].Filter value of 0 means there is no interpolation and the current value is not corrected.Filter value of 1 means the previous state is used instead of the current one.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getFilter
member.summary: A filter value used to correct the current state of the analog axis (thumbsticks and triggers) relative to the previous one:Filter value of 0 means there is no interpolation and the current value is not corrected.Filter value of 1 means the previous state is used instead of the current one.
member.returns: The filter of the gamepad.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getAxesLeft
member.summary: Returns a vector of axes of the left thumbstick. When a thumbstick is in the center position, this value is [0,0]. The values correspond to the following thumbstick positions: First value corresponds to the X axis. Negative values indicate the left position; positive values indicate right. Second value corresponds to the Y axis. Negative values indicate the down position; positive values indicate up.
member.returns: A vector of two values in the [-1;1] range.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getAxesLeftDelta
member.summary: Returns a vector of delta values of the left thumbstick axes — the difference between the values in the previous and the current frames.
member.returns: Vector of delta axes.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getAxesRight
member.summary: Returns a vector of axes of the right thumbstick. When a thumbstick is in the center position, this value is [0,0]. The values correspond to the following thumbstick positions: First value corresponds to the X axis. Negative values indicate the left position; positive values indicate right. Second value corresponds to the Y axis. Negative values indicate the down position; positive values indicate up.
member.returns: A vector of two values in the [-1;1] range.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getAxesRightDelta
member.summary: Returns a vector of delta values of the right thumbstick axes — the difference between the values in the previous and the current frames.
member.returns: Vector of delta axes.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getTriggerLeft
member.summary: Returns an axis state value (the position) of the left trigger. 0 means the trigger is not pressed; 1 means the trigger is pressed to the maximum.
member.returns: Value in range [0; 1].

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getTriggerLeftDelta
member.summary: Returns the delta value of the left trigger — the difference between the values in the previous and the current frame.
member.returns: Left trigger delta.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getTriggerRight
member.summary: Returns an axis state value (the position) of the right trigger. 0 means the trigger is not pressed; 1 means the trigger is pressed to the maximum.
member.returns: Value in range [0; 1].

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.getTriggerRightDelta
member.summary: Returns the delta value of the right trigger — the difference between the values in the previous and the current frame.
member.returns: Right trigger delta.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.setLeftMotor(float)
member.summary: Sets the amount of vibration for the left motor (a low-frequency motor).

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.setRightMotor(float)
member.summary: Sets the amount of vibration for the right motor (a high-frequency motor).

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.isAvailable
member.summary: Checks if the game pad is available.
member.returns: 1 if the game pad is available; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.isButtonPressed(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given button is pressed.
member.param: One of the preset BUTTON_ codes.
member.returns: 1 if the button is pressed; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.isButtonDown(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given button was pressed during the current frame.
member.param: One of the preset BUTTON_ codes.
member.returns: 1 if the button was pressed during the current frame; otherwise, 0.

member.name: M:Unigine.InputGamePad.isButtonUp(int)
member.summary: Returns a value indicating if the given button was released during the current frame.
member.param: One of the preset BUTTON_ codes.
member.returns: 1 if the button was released during the current frame; otherwise, 0.

member.name: F:Unigine.InputGamePad.NUM_BUTTONS
member.summary: Number of buttons on a game pad.
